name: Fluffy Unicorn
description:
Pink Fluffy Unicorns Dancing On Rainbows! Ride your own pink fluffy unicorn in a fascinating world out of candy canes, rainbows and stars! Dodge the canes and collect stars to gain more points and stay on top of the leaderboard. Score points to impress your friends.

FEATURES

  • power ups (stars)
  • global leaderboard / social leaderboard
  • achievements

COMMENTS

"OMG I love this so much, this is amazing!"

"I love this!!!!! It is so cute!!!! Best game ever can't stop playing it."

PERMISSIONS

Network (complete internet acces): For highscores, google login (if you wish) and ad banner download

Your Accounts: google login (if you wish)

PLANNED FEATURES

  • unicorn customization (colors/accessoires)

To support the development please rate the game or visit our development homepage at http://freakxzone.de . Thanks :)
